Replacing the traffic lines passing through
the center of the Spanish capital Madrid,
this is a traditional ceremony
performed by indigenous people every year on
ancient livestock routes.
The annual event is approved by the National Assembly.
Spain recognized in
1994 that as part of the Madrid festival Fiesta De La
Chumia, on
this day shepherds would use
traditional routes to herd
their animals to reach the southern pastures.  to
